body.name: Laptop Bag for Women 15.6 Inch Laptop Tote Bag Waterproof Leather Tote Bag Unique Work Bag Large Capacity Office Briefcase Lightweight Business Computer Shoulder Handbag, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Waterproof Laptop Bag】 This laptop bag for women is made of durable, waterproof, scratch-resistant PU leather and high-density polyester lining. The look designed with a retro and unique embossed floral pattern that is not only adds a sophisticated artistic touch to the laptop bag, but exudes a youthful and modern vibe, while showing taste and personality. Equipped with smooth zipper and sturdy handle, plus the reinforced stitching at each stress point, make the women laptop bag more durable.

【Large Capacity Work Bag】 The work bag is divided into 3 parts. The computer compartment of this laptop tote bag provides a thick foam padded for your 15.6 inch laptop with a Velcro fixed strap. One large open pocket is suitable for storing A4 documents, books, iPad, etc., one zipper pocket for personal belongings, 2 slip pockets and pen pockets. 2 mesh pockets for storing water bottles or umbrellas. Organized storage space effectively reduces the time it takes to find the items you need.

【Practical Tote Bag】 This laptop tote bag has a smooth and secure zipper on the top, thick foam padding computer compartment, plus a reinforced design with 4 metal feet on the bottom, allowing this work tote bag to better protect your laptop from bumps. Smooth metal zippers also ensure easy access. In addition, this laptop bag for women attached with a detachable elegant silk scarf that allows you to customize your own fashion.

【Women Tote Bag Size】 The size of the laptop briefcase is 16 x 5.5 x 13 inches (L*W*H). This laptop tote bag designed with comfortable leather handle and an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap (25.2-47.2 inches), make it can be used as not only a handbag, but also a shoulder bag. Elegant and unique retro pattern design on the front of the laptop bag makes it can be easily matched with various clothing, fashionable and practical, creating a sensible and mature femininity for you.

【Ideal Gift Choice】 Large-capacity multifunctional laptop bag for women is good to used as a handbag, laptop bag, teacher tote bag, shoulder bag, handbag, work tote bag, computer bag and ladies briefcase. The attractive and stylish vintage floral pattern appearance design, paired with golden metal accessories, making this women laptop bag more distinctive and eye-catching compared to similar bags. It is an ideal holiday gift for your mother, girlfriend, wife, sister and yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Gorgeous Work Bag With a Few Caveats
reviews.reviewText: Since this bag is intended for women, I got my daughter to help me assess this bag from a woman's perspective. The good: Firstly, I LOVE this bag, despite the few flaws I will outline below. The color is a deeply saturated teal green and the leather stamped floral pattern is beautiful, even, and a smart looking design. The gold tone zippers and other hardware look great on it and the little scarf that comes with is a cute (but honestly unnecessary) accent as this bag looks good all on its own. There are appropriately sized pockets for a phone big enough to accommodate my phone’s thin wallet case, two mesh pockets on either side, a sleeve for a pen, and a zippered inner pocket for loose little stuff. There is padding on the bottom of the laptop sleeve to protect the laptop edge, and the bag is rigid enough to be trusted to stand up, as well as a little Velcro strap to make sure your laptop doesn’t slide out.My only observations, and these are not enough to dissuade me from adoring the bag:-The mesh on each end will hold a travel mug, but it’s pretty tight, so nothing of wider diameter than a Thermos SIPP mug can fit.-The laptop sleeve for some reason has enough excess material to fill the main compartment of the bag. If you wanted to transport 2 laptops, an iPad, and a couple spiral notebooks, you could easily fit all of them in the sleeve, so it looks a little weird if all you’re transporting is one laptop and then normal purse stuff.-The outside wall of the bag does not have any padding for the laptop, which would have been a nice addition. Overall, I’d definitely order it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality of the bag is very nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and Beautiful Laptop Carrying Bag.
reviews.reviewText: I've been on the hunt for a nice laptop bag for a while, and this is the most beautiful one I've come across thus far.I ordered the Deep Green color and it looks so sophisticated in person, almost like a saturated jewel tone. The embossed floral is so pretty and the PU leather material feels super sturdy and thick. I feel fancy each time I leave the house with this bag and it works with a variety of upscale outfits.It would be perfect for professionals in an office setting, though I personally work from home and take this to the cafe. I'd expect to pay a lot more for a bag like this; it's an excellent value at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is really a very beautiful leather bag
reviews.reviewText: The bag I was sent is green and it is a very dark, forest green - not a blue green like some of the green leather can appear when it has been deep dyed. This bag has a beautiful, stamped design on one side which adds a nice, almost island-like look with beautiful flowers that match the black and white pattern that is found on the black and white silky scarf-like fabric that comes attached to the handle.Inside there is a very nice, padded compartment meant for a computer to be safe and kept safe and immobile. for transportation. This leaves a lot of room in the rest of the bag for everything else someone might need for school or work. On either side, there is a mesh for a water bottle (inside) and on the opposite side from the computer compartment is a zipper compartment, two open compartments and two places to put pens or markers. There are no zippers or openings on the outside.There are two handles outside so this can easily be a very nice hand-bag but it also comes with an adjustable shoulder strap so the bag can be used as either as a cross body bag or shoulder bag. The leather is soft. The bag is lined with a nice canvas and has a zipper across the top that closes the bag.Over all, I am extremely pleased with this bag. From the color, to the solid construction, to the excellent materials. I recommend this bag. 5 out of 5! It is difficult to find a quality women's handbag anymore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my LG Gram
reviews.reviewText: Now that laptops no longer come with CD drives, or even physical hard drives anymore, they are getting slimmer and slimmer. My 17" LG Gram is an example. I no longer need my big bulky laptop backpack to carry my laptop and charger. That LG Gram slips into this slim laptop bag nicely. Laptop chargers used to be huge bulky heavy black "bricks"! Today most laptops charge from a relatively smaller 100 Watt USB C charger. There is enough room in this to carry accessories like that. Throw in an inch thick manual or even earphones if they are not too huge. This expands enough to handle that, and it looks sharp to boot. Alas, I'm a 70 year old retired electronics technician. I immediately took that cool looking scarf off of it, as that is just not me. However, it would be a nice touch to someone else perhaps. At any rate, this is a nice sturdy bag that seems to be made with quality materials. It should take some abuse getting knocked around in the back seat of a car. I would recommend it and give it five stars!
